scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, wearing a crown of thorns and a loincloth. Below the cross, a skull rests on the ground. To the left of the cross, a group of women, including the Virgin Mary in a blue mantle, mourn. To the right, Saint John the Evangelist, in a red robe, gestures towards Christ, accompanied by other figures. In the background, a city with towers and buildings is visible, set against a hilly landscape and a sky with scattered clouds and birds. The overall composition is framed by an arched border.
